community_listings.title: Open Call: Microgrants 2025
community_listings.description: Rhizome Microgrants support digital artists and cultural practitioners. Applications accepted on a rolling basis.

community_listings.title: NEW INC - Art & Technology Incubator
community_listings.description: NEW INC is a cultural incubator for people working at the intersection of art, design, and technology.

community_listings.title: ArtBase - Net Art Archive
community_listings.description: An archive of over 2,500 works of net art, born-digital art, and new media art preserving digital culture since 1999.

community_listings.title: Net Art Anthology
community_listings.description: A collection of 100 works tracing the history of net art from the 1980s to the present.

community_listings.title: Seven on Seven Conference
community_listings.description: Annual conference pairing leading artists and technologists for collaborative dialogue.

community_listings.title: Digital Preservation Programs
community_listings.description: Pioneering initiatives focused on preserving digital art and born-digital culture.

community_listings.title: Commissions Program
community_listings.description: Supporting the creation of innovative new works of digital art through artist commissions.

community_listings.title: Rhizome Editorial
community_listings.description: Essays, interviews, and commentary on digital art, technology, and culture.

community_listings.title: Community Programs
community_listings.description: Workshops, talks, and community events exploring digital culture and net art.

community_listings.title: Artists Directory
community_listings.description: Directory of digital artists, net artists, and new media practitioners in the Rhizome community.

notes: Rhizome.org community listings including programs, events, opportunities, and archives.
fetch_status: error: Cloudflare protection blocks automated access (403 Forbidden)
technical_details: Site requires JavaScript execution and Cloudflare challenge completion. All automated fetch methods (WebFetch, curl, Python urllib) blocked. Maintaining curated data of current Rhizome programs and initiatives. Future automation may require headless browser (Playwright/Puppeteer) or API access.
